testcase.name: Create new user successfully - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the application is configured to connect to base url..................passed When The admin sends a POST request to the "user" endPoint with "1" and "testUser" and "test" and "test" and "test" and "123456" and "123456789" and "90".passed Then Verify that the content type is "application/json".....................passed And Verify that the status code is "200"....................................passed Then Verify that the response contains the required fields..................passed

testcase.name: Update user successfully - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the application is configured to connect to base url..................passed When The admin sends a PUT request to the "user" endPoint with "10" and "testUser" and "updated" and "user" and "updated" and "654321" and "987654321" and "1".passed Then Verify that the content type is "application/json".....................passed And Verify that the status code is "200"....................................passed Then Verify that the response contains the required fields..................passed

testcase.name: User is displayed successfully by name
testcase.system-out: Given the application is configured to connect to base url..................passed When The admin sends a GET request to the "user" endpoint with user name "testUser".passed Then Verify that the status code is "200"...................................passed And Verify that the response userDetails contains required fields...........passed

testcase.name: User is deleted successfully by name
testcase.system-out: Given the application is configured to connect to base url..................passed When The admin sends a DELETE request to the "user" endpoint with query params "testUser".passed Then Verify that the status code is "200"...................................passed
